sentence.Network_en: The film takes no position on the politics of Northern Ireland.

sentence.Network_en: These incidents suggest the peace in Northern Ireland is still brittle.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些事件表明北爱尔兰的和平仍然很脆弱。

entry.tran: 北的;(在)北部的;来自北部的
entry.def: Northern means in or from the north of a region, state, or country.

example.ex: Their two children were immigrants to Northern Ireland from Pennsylvania...
example.tran: 他们的两个孩子是从宾夕法尼亚州移民到北爱尔兰的。

example.ex: Prices at three-star hotels fell furthest in several northern cities.
example.tran: 3星级宾馆的住宿价格在几个北方城市降得最多。

means.word_mean: 1. in or characteristic of a region of the United States north of (approximately) the Mason-Dixon line;
2. situated in or oriented toward the north;
3. coming from the north; used especially of wind;
4. situated in or coming from regions of the north;

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,"……方向的"; 2. 表名词,"……场所"

stems_affixes.word_buile: east东+ern……方向的→adj.东方的,东部的
northeast东北+ern……方向的→adj.东北方的,来自东北的
north北+ern……方向的→adj.北方的,北部的
northwest西北+ern……方向的→adj.西北方的,来自西北的
south南+ern……方向的→adj.南方的,南部的
southwest西南+ern……方向的→adj.西南的,来自西南的
west西+ern……方向的→adj.西方的,西部的
cist箱子+ern……场所→n.[抽水马桶的]贮水池
lect讲话+ern……场所→n.[教堂中的]诵经台

Sentence.sentence: Likewise, theimpactof this warming will be very different depending on where you are—coastal areas must worry about rising sea levels, while Siberia and northern Canada may become more habitable (宜居的) andappealingfor humans than these areas are now.
Monarch butterflies, the large origin black insects, are common summer sights in northern United States and Canada.
During the same time frame, the University of Northern Iowa graduated 67% of its white students, but only 39% of its blacks.

sentences.en: The park is in the northern part of the city.
sentences.cn: 公园位于该城市的北部。

jushi.english: People in far northern countries sometimes form small houses out of bricks of ice.
jushi.chinese: 住在极北部国家的人有时用冰建造小房子。

jushi.english: The country is located in the northern part of Europe.
Mrs. Li speaks with a precise northern accent at the precise moment.
jushi.chinese: 李女士恰恰在那个时候用十足的北方口音讲话。
